scripts.dev:firefox: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webextension-toolbox dev firefox -c webextension-toolbox-config.js
scripts.dev:chrome: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NODE_ENV=development npx webextension-toolbox dev chrome -c webextension-toolbox-config.js
scripts.build:firefox: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webextension-toolbox build firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r dial-firefox-$(date +%y%m%d).zip manifest.json main.js main.css index.html background.js _locales/** logo.svg && cp *.zip ../ && cd .. && rimraf rm -rf ./firefox
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webextension-toolbox build chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r dial-chrome-$(date +%y%m%d).zip manifest.json main.js main.css index.html _locales/** && cp *.zip ../ && cd .. && rimraf rm -rf ./chrome
